Name: Eggsplorer
About the game: This game is a single player game that can be enjoyed offline. The story starts in a mysterious temple. Your goal is to manipulate the egg to capture four unique stages, obtain the owl statue, and open the gate leading to the back of the temple. 'A stage with a gate that grows and shrinks' 'A stage with glass that breaks when dropped using height' 'Staging puzzles offline using a mirror image of yourself' 'A stage that uses a portal to transfer objects' These four stages await you. Solve puzzles to get goal items. One stage can be cleared in about 15 minutes. What awaits after obtaining all the owl statues? Please check it out. Also, find 3 hidden items in each stage and take on the challenge! Trailer BGM scratch record Trailer BGM by HURT RECORD
